Articles.Content:
I think science could have a duel purpose.

Atm, there is no in game hints with regards to interplanetary transfer windows and landers. I think science should give you diagram/text hints and or unlock stock landers.

I think the game has a enough of a steep learning curve than *fly a lander to a planet and get stranded*

Unless the devs just like laughing at all us noobs who land kerbals on Eve.
It's a good idea, but it will likely be a bit more complex than it seems at first. Career mode is in its infancy, after all
